text: I have been using Costume City for the 2nd year to rent theme costume for my company's D&D. They have excellent choices and staffs are super friendly and accommodative. Gives us suggestions and don't mind trying out as much as we want. No rushing. Would greatly recommend if u have any costumes to buy or rent.

Was sourcing for costumes for our event when I happened to find Costume City!

The staff there are very pleasant to work with and the variety of costumes is aplenty!

They import quite a number of costumes from overseas but rest assured the quality is there!

Prices and deposits are competitive too, cheaper dare I say.

While it was initially difficult to find costumes online because of the lack of a proper catalogue, the only reason for that is really because of the variety of costumes they have!

If you want to rent costumes for events and such, I would recommend Costume City!
Rented a Shrek costume which was in a good condition. There is a wide variety of costumes to choose from and the shop owner, Joyce, is very hospitable and helpful. Great experience!

Rented a wizard costume over the new year. Shop owner is very friendly and patient to introduce different costumes. There are ALOT of costumes to choose from.

Great place to come rent costumes.
Very hospitable and friendly service! Can see that the owner is very passionate in this field ü•∞ There is a variety of costumes to choose from. Thank you for the wonderful experience!
